name: MRS. MEYER'S Clean Day Dog Deodorizing Spray, Sweet Chamomile Scent, 8oz
short_description: GENTLE BUT EFFECTIVE: A deodorizing spray that conditions and adds shine to your dog’s coat
MADE WITH FUNCTIONAL INGREDIENTS: Crafted with glycerin, oat extract, aloe, chamomile, and rosemary to moisturize and add shine (all while deodorizing smells!)
JUST FOR DOGS: Veterinarian tested and pH balanced formula
SCENTS DESIGNED WITH PEOPLE AND PETS IN MIND: Sweet Chamomile scent soothes and comforts leaving your pup fresh and serene—perfect for your gentle companion
A CLEAN YOU CAN TRUST: Made of USDA Biobased formulas and recyclable bottles. Always Leaping Bunny Cruelty-Free and made without sulfates, parabens, phthalates, and artificial colors
product_description: Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day, now for your pets. Our new Dog Deodorizing Spritz is an easy, no rinse spritz. A gentle, just-for-dogs formula conditions coats and adds shine with just a few sprays. This gentle, soft (and quiet!) spritz makes for an easy application on even the wiggliest and most excitable of pups. Plus, our hardworking pet keeping formula fights stinks and smells right at the source, keeping your dog feeling fresh and smelling clean.

name: POOPH Pet Odor Eliminator, 32oz - Eliminates Odors at The Molecular Level, Dogs, Cats, Freshener, Eliminator, Urine, Poop, Pee, Deodorizer, Natures, Puppy, Fresh, Clean, Furniture, Potty
short_description: POOPH SAFELY eliminates the toughest odors WITHOUT fragrances or harmful ingredients. It’s smarter to ELIMINATE odors instead of COVERING THEM UP with fragrances Fragrances can be particularly irritating for dogs and cats who have 10,000X greater sense of smell than people! Even fragrances that smell good in household products have been characterized as potentially dangerous “indoor air pollutants” associated with a wide range of unexpected health consequences—so choose the products that get into your home wisely!
Proprietary technology eliminates odors at the source, leaving NO chemical residuals or fragrances behind – just clean, fresh air.
POOPH SAFELY eliminates “stink” from carpets, rugs, upholstery, drapes or hard surfaces and leaves no NO chemical residuals or fragrances behind – just clean, fresh air.
Ideal for urine, feces, vomit, sour, spoiled and nasty food odors, garbage cans, stinky upholstery and more.
POOPH is eco-conscious and SAFE for people, pets, and plants because it contains no fragrances harmful ingredients.

name: Arm & Hammer for Pets Ultra Fresh Waterless Bath Spray in White Jasmine Scent | Dry Dog Shampoo, Deodorizer
short_description: WATERLESS DOG SHAMPOO WITH BAKING SODA - This dry dog shampoo is an easy way to keep your dog clean and fresh without a full bath. This no-rinse formula is great to hold over until your next dog bath

DEODORIZING DOG ODOR SPRAY FOR FUR - Great for combatting dog odors, this waterless dog spray is a dog deodorizer spray that cleans while it eliminates dog odors. A must-have in your dog grooming supplies cabinet
DOG COLOGNE SPRAY INFUSED WITH BAKING SODA - With the signature Arm & Hammer baking soda as a premium ingredient, this waterless no rinse dog shampoo / dog spray naturally helps absorb bad pet odors

EASY TO USE DOG DRY SHAMPOO TO ELIMINATE DOG SMELL - To use this pet cologne spray for dogs, simply spray your dog from the back of ears to tail, carefully avoiding eyes. Massage into your dog's coat and repeat as necessary

FRESH WILD JASMINE SCENT DOG SPRAY - Enjoy the calming fresh jasmine fragrance left behind by this no rinse dog shampoo for all dogs; use this dog cologne spray long lasting fragrance regularly between baths for best results
product_description: Freshen up your pet to the next level with Arm & Hammer Ultra Fresh grooming. Our Waterless Bath Spray in Fresh Jasmine instantly cleanses and helps balance moisture for a radiant shine in between baths. Made with cucumber and white tea and infused with baking soda, this dog spray neutralizes bad odors and removes impurities for an advanced clean. This no-rinse formula makes clean ups quick and easy with a revitalizing fresh jasmine fragrance leaving your pet Ultra Fresh every time. Keep your dog clean and fresh with this waterless dog wash that works naturally. This gentle dog spray is infused with the signature Arm & Hammer baking soda, great for combatting dog odors. It naturally takes care of pet odors, keeping your pup smelling fresh all day (scent may vary, depending on availability). The Arm & Hammer Ultra Fresh Waterless Deodorizing Dry Dog Shampoo comes in a convenient spray pump bottle. Use in conjunction with our other Ultra Fresh products to help lock in the delicious scent! DIRECTIONS: Spray dog from back of ears to tail, carefully avoiding eyes. Massage into coat. Repeat as necessary. Can be used on wet or dry fur. For external use only. INGREDIENTS: Water, Coconut Based Surfactants, EDTA Disodium Salt, Alkyl Polyglucoside, Glycerin, Glyceryl Cocoate, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, White Tea Extract, Butylene Glycol, Cucumber Extract, Fragrance, DMDM Hydantoin. WARNINGS: For external use only. Safe for dogs 8 weeks of age and older. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

short_description: HARDWORKING: A made-for-your-pet cleaner is great for cleaning up typical pet messes and stinks like accidents and odors on soft surfaces

MADE WITH POWERFUL INGREDIENTS: Crafted with micro-helpers for up to 7 days of continuous cleaning power, odor neutralizing technology, and essential oils to tame pet smells and stinks right at the source opposed to masking them
FOR HARD-TO-CLEAN SOFT SURFACES: Made to be used on carpets, rugs, upholstery, bedding, and clothing
SCENTS DESIGNED WITH PEOPLE AND PETS IN MIND: Our Orange Blossom scent smells like a bright, floral burst of blooming citrus—keeping your pet’s space smelling as fresh as a sunny orchard
A CLEAN YOU CAN TRUST: Made of USDA Biobased formulas and recyclable bottles. Always Leaping Bunny Cruelty-Free and made without bleach, hydrogen peroxide, parabens, phthalates, and glycol solvents
product_description: Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day for your pets. Our new Stain & Odor Fighter is tough on pet messes and accidents but friendly on whiskers and paws. With scents designed with people and pets in mind, this hardworking product fights pet stains and odors for up to 7 days with the power of probiotics for all your soft surfaces—from carpets, rugs and couches to bedding, upholstery, and clothing. Because everybody (especially our pets!) oops sometimes.

name: Wahl USA Deodorizing & Refreshing Pet Deodorant for Dogs - Eucalyptus & Spearmint Scent to Refresh the Skin and Coat - Model 820011A
short_description: Made in the USA - Our eucalyptus & spearmint plant derived pet deodorant is pH balanced, alcohol free and paraben free and is highly recommended for refreshing and deodorizing your dogs’ coat and skin.

Deodorizing & Refreshing Formula – This eucalyptus & spearmint scented animal deodorant is great for deodorizing and refreshing dirty or smelly odors of the coat and skin. The eucalyptus used in Wahl shampoo is safe for external use on pets and should not be ingested
Quick & Easy – Simply spray our doggie deodorant on any pet that needs a refresh between baths, and it will help strengthen coats and make them shine.

Allergy Friendly - Our dog icon, Rocket, was designed in the image of our family dog Cooper – a golden doodle, who has severe allergies. This is the only deodorizer we have found safe and effective. He loves the smell too!

The Brand Used by Professionals - Wahl has been serving professional vets and groomers for over 50 years. clean, condition fur & hair for a smooth, soft coat. We are a company of animal lovers that want the best for your family member
product_description: Are you looking for a way to make sure your pup smells fresh and clean all day long? Look no further than Wahls 8 oz Deodorizing & Refreshing Pet Deodorant for Dogs – Eucalyptus & Spearmint scent to refresh the skin and shine the coat in between bathes. This easy-to-use dog cologne is an absolute must when it comes to puppy essentials. It not only eliminates bad odors, but it also leaves your pet smelling sweet and pleasant. The unique combination of eucalyptus and spearmint leaves behind a refreshing scent while helping condition the skin and coat. This pH balanced, paraben, & alcohol free pet odor eliminator utilizes technology that is designed to neutralize odors while making sure the aroma isn’t overly strong or bothersome. Our plant derived ingredients make our deodorant the choice for owners who want to avoid harsh chemicals for their dog and themselves. No matter if you’re looking for a dog deodorizing spray or something more along the lines of a dog perfume, this product will keep your pet smelling great and ready for cuddles any time of day! While there are no harmful chemicals in our pet products, some pets are sensitive to certain plant oils used in our products. Wahl strongly recommend talking to your vet and doing a small spot test on your pet at least 24 hours before using any new product. Wahls Deodorizing & Refreshing Pet Deodorant – Model 820011A – will make an essential addition to any pups hygiene routine. Our bottles feature a spray lock to prevent leakage, this lock is engaged for shipping purposes. To unlock before use, simply press the button on the side of the sprayer head.

name: Earth Rated Dog Deodorizing Conditioner Spray, Conditioning & Odor-Eliminating Perfume for Dogs, for All Coat Types, Refreshing White Tea & Basil Scent, 8 oz
short_description: TRIPLE ACTION: A dog perfume that conditions, deodorizes and helps tackle tangles for a quick refresh without the fuss. Perfect for at home or on-the-go. Use daily or as often as needed
REFRESHING SCENT: Luxurious White Tea & Basil Scent combats unwanted odors and will leave your dog smelling fresh & clean, without the need for a bath. Perfect for all coat types
NO-RINSE, NO-FUSS: Shake well and spray directly onto your dog from the back of the ears to the tail, avoiding the face. Brush or massage into coat. Allow to dry naturally. No rinsing needed!

GENTLE FORMULA: Free from harsh chemicals like parabens, sulfates, and alcohol. Our grooming products are hypoallergenic, cruelty-free and Leaping Bunny certified. Includes 1 Dog Refresh Mist Spray, 8 oz

EARTH RATED: Our mission is to make everyday moments for people and their dogs simpler and better. We do this by designing innovative products that are thoughtfully unexpected. We are also proudly B Corp Certified
product_details: Special Ingredients Aqua, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Glycerin, Zinc Ricinoleate, Caesalpinia Spinosa Gum, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylenediamine, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance.

name: Nature’s Miracle Air Care Deodorizer Air, Fabric and Surface Spray Lavender & Vanilla Scent, 24 Ounces, Pet Odor Eliminator
short_description: PET ODOR ELIMINATOR: Works to break down and help neutralize tough pet odors on contact – doesn’t just mask them.
AIR, FABRIC & SURFACE SPRAY: Works to neutralize pet odors in the air and on fabrics and hard surfaces, including carpet, hard floor, crates and more.
LAVENDER & VANILLA SCENT: Made with a fragrance blend containing essential oils.
ODORCAPTURE 360: Formulated with odor neutralizing technology.
SAFE FOR PETS AND HOME: Use on surfaces around your home. Safe for use around pets and home when used and stored as directed.
product_description: Life with pets can get a bit smelly. When it does, Nature’s Miracle Air Care Deodorizer is the ultimate pet odor eliminator for airborne, fabric and hard-surface odors. Unlike many products that may simply mask unpleasant pet odors, this pet odor controlling solution is formulated with OdorCapture 360™ odor control technology and works to break down and help destroy tough pet odors on contact. Plus, it’s made with a fragrance blend containing essential oils to leave a pleasant lavender and vanilla scent. Spray in the air or on surfaces to help neutralize pet odors on fabrics and hard surfaces, including carpet, hard floor, crates and more spaces throughout the home. Safe for pets and home when used and stored as directed. Not for use on pets.
